title: Jerry Concept Organization
description: A webpage for a cyber cafe to showcase services, pricing, and contact information. It includes a booking system for appointments and a payment system for services.

title: Get MyCar Parked
description: A parking system that allows users to book a parking space for secure parking with payment according to the car size.

title: Techversity
description: A learning management system (LMS) that provides a platform for users to learn and earn certificates. It also has a payment system that allows users to pay for their courses using five different currency of choice.

title: Kyobi Hotel
description: An hotel system to manage booking and checking out of rooms. It also has a payment system that allows users to pay for their booking using XFI token.

title: Verses Generator
description: An API interactive website that randomly generte Quran & Bible Verses and their meaning together with the chapter they belongs and it's verse number.
